title: The Gruesome Story of How Neuralink’s Monkeys Actually Died
description: Elon Musk says no primates died as a result of Neuralink’s implants. A WIRED investigation now reveals the grisly specifics of their deaths as US authorities have been asked to investigate Musk’s claims.

title: OpenAI’s Dall-E 3 Is an Art Generator Powered by ChatGPT
description: OpenAI has launched Dall-E 3, which uses ChatGPT to take the pain out of prompting. Now you can modify artwork by simply talking to the chatbot.

title: Amazon Upgrades Alexa for the ChatGPT Era
description: A sweeping upgrade to Amazon’s Alexa taps AI technology like that behind ChatGPT and also allows the virtual assistant to attempt to read body language.

title: The Kids Don’t Want to Go to College Anymore, and Why Would They?
description: Journalist and author Paul Tough tells us about what’s driving rising tuition fees, lower enrollment, and the myth of college as an equalizer in the US.
